question: Consider the real-world 3D location of the objects. Which object is further away from the camera?
question_with_options:
Consider the real-world 3D location of the objects. Which object is further away from the camera?
A. white car
B. orange "Z" sign
C. None
D. None
triage_reason: The white car is clearly positioned further back on the street, behind the fire hydrant, while the orange "Z" sign is mounted on a nearby building close to the camera's perspective.
